attributes.action: Release Jack Tweeds Kerfew so his wife can spend her last few weeks with her husband
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think Jack Tweeds kerfew should be released temporarily so he can be there for his wife Jade Goody through the last of her illness.  Only until Jade passes away, but this is for Jade and not his benefit.  She needs him, her husband.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
